GeneClass2
55 was used to estimate recent gene flow between temperate and subtropical populations using the criteria and the computational algorithm of Rannala and Mountain
56 with default settings. Individuals were assigned to a source population when an individual had the highest assigned probability >70%, and others were regarded as unassigned. Because the two geographically close Wakayama populations (WAHs and WAHk) and the two Goto populations (GAHo and GAHk) were not significantly differentiated (TableÂ 3), we combined these populations for only the GeneClass2 analysis.
